labs.title: AWS Resilient Architectures to Azure: Multi-AZ, Auto Scaling, and Disaster Recovery
labs.description: Master resilient architecture design by implementing AWS multi-AZ deployments, auto scaling, and disaster recovery patterns, then migrating to Azure availability zones, scale sets, and site recovery solutions with enterprise-grade resilience.

labs.title: AWS Cost-Optimized Architectures to Azure: Reserved Capacity, Spot Instances, and FinOps
labs.description: Master cost-optimized architecture design by implementing AWS cost optimization strategies including reserved instances, spot instances, and right-sizing, then migrating to Azure with reserved VMs, spot VMs, and comprehensive FinOps practices.

labs.title: AWS SDLC Automation to Azure DevOps: Advanced CI/CD, Testing Automation, and Development Lifecycle Management
labs.description: Master advanced SDLC automation by implementing comprehensive CI/CD pipelines, automated testing frameworks, and development lifecycle management on AWS, then migrating to Azure DevOps with equivalent automation, testing, and deployment capabilities.

labs.title: AWS Infrastructure as Code to Azure ARM: Advanced Configuration Management, IaC Patterns, and Automated Provisioning
labs.description: Master advanced Infrastructure as Code and configuration management by implementing sophisticated AWS CloudFormation, CDK, and Systems Manager solutions, then migrating to Azure ARM Templates, Bicep, and Automation with equivalent provisioning and configuration capabilities.

labs.title: AWS Database Migration to Azure Migration Services: Advanced Deployment and Database Migration Strategies

labs.title: AWS Database Management to Azure Database Operations: Advanced Database Administration and Operational Excellence

labs.title: AWS Threat Detection to Azure Security Response: Advanced Threat Hunting and Incident Management

labs.title: AWS Security Governance to Azure Security Management: Enterprise Security Strategy and Compliance Automation

solutions_architect_associate.title: Solutions Architect Associate Track (SAA-C03) - 100% Coverage
solutions_architect_associate.description: Complete preparation for AWS SAA-C03 certification equivalent skills and knowledge with full domain coverage

solutions_architect_professional.title: Solutions Architect Professional Track (SAP-C02) - 100% Coverage
solutions_architect_professional.description: Complete preparation for advanced enterprise scenarios equivalent to AWS SAP-C02 with full domain coverage

clf_c02_track.title: Cloud Practitioner Track (CLF-C02) - 100% Coverage
clf_c02_track.description: Complete foundational cloud knowledge equivalent to AWS Cloud Practitioner certification with full domain coverage

dva_c02_track.title: Developer Associate Track (DVA-C02) - 100% Coverage
dva_c02_track.description: Complete AWS Developer Associate equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Development (32%), Security (26%), Deployment (24%), Troubleshooting (18%)

soa_c02_track.title: SysOps Administrator Associate Track (SOA-C02) - 100% Coverage
soa_c02_track.description: Complete AWS SysOps Administrator Associate equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Monitoring & Remediation (20%), Reliability & Continuity (16%), Deployment & Automation (18%), Security & Compliance (16%), Networking & Content Delivery (18%), Cost & Performance Optimization (12%)

dea_c01_track.title: Data Engineer Associate Track (DEA-C01) - 100% Coverage
dea_c01_track.description: Complete AWS Data Engineer Associate equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Data Ingestion & Transformation (34%), Data Store Management (26%), Data Operations & Support (22%), Data Security & Governance (18%)

mla_c01_track.title: Machine Learning Engineer Associate Track (MLA-C01) - 100% Coverage
mla_c01_track.description: Complete AWS Machine Learning Engineer Associate equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Model Development (26%), Model Deployment & Maintenance (22%), Data Engineering for ML (20%), Exploratory Data Analysis (16%), ML Operations & MLOps (16%)

ans_c01_track.title: Advanced Networking Specialty Track (ANS-C01) - 100% Coverage
ans_c01_track.description: Complete AWS Advanced Networking Specialty equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Network Design (30%), Network Implementation (26%), Network Security, Compliance & Governance (24%), Network Management & Operations (20%)

mls_c01_track.title: Machine Learning Specialty Track (MLS-C01) - 100% Coverage
mls_c01_track.description: Complete AWS Machine Learning Specialty equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Modeling (36%), Exploratory Data Analysis (24%), Data Engineering (20%), ML Implementation & Operations (20%)

scs_c02_track.title: Security Specialty Track (SCS-C02) - 100% Coverage
scs_c02_track.description: Complete AWS Security Specialty equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Infrastructure Security (20%), Security Logging & Monitoring (18%), Data Protection (18%), Identity & Access Management (16%), Threat Detection & Incident Response (14%), Governance & Security Management (14%)

dbs_c01_track.title: Database Specialty Track (DBS-C01) - 100% Coverage
dbs_c01_track.description: Complete AWS Database Specialty equivalent skills with full domain coverage: Workload-Specific Database Design (26%), Deployment and Migration (20%), Management and Operations (18%), Monitoring and Troubleshooting (18%), Database Security (18%)

dop_c02_track.title: DevOps Engineer Professional Track (DOP-C02) - 100% Coverage
dop_c02_track.description: Complete DevOps automation and infrastructure management equivalent to AWS DOP-C02 certification with full domain coverage
